outputs.output_descr:
1.Capacity building of focal teachers and district education officers and instutionalization of nature clubs
2.Nature club hand books developed
3. Development of Environment Education modules fo rthe 2 college of Paro and Samtse
4. Action Grant support  to schools
5. World Environment Day celebration supported
6. Local Conservation Support groups formed

project_descr: Building Civil Society Support for Biodiversity Conservation through Environment Resource Networking
project_title: Build Civil Society Support forBiodiversity Conservation
